name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom New Tab with Clock and Search

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the New Tab background with a custom image, adds a clock and a search bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your new tab experience with a stunning background and useful features. This extension replaces your default new tab page with a beautiful background image, along with a centered clock displaying the accurate time and an intuitive search bar. Enjoy a minimalist yet refined interface that lets you quickly access your favorite websites in no time.
